title: Understanding the Spectrum
text: Consider why the term 'spectrum' is used in the context of Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD).

title: Range of Characteristics
text: Think about the variety of characteristics and abilities that individuals with ASD might display.

hintAnswer: children with ASD demonstrate a great range of strengths, abilities, and areas of need
title: Identifying the Correct Answer
text: Which statement best explains why ASD is referred to as a spectrum disorder?
choices: children with ASD demonstrate a great range of strengths, abilities, and areas of need
children with ASD are on a spectrum
children with ASD do not have functional play skills
